text: Isonandra is a genus of plants in the family Sapotaceae found in tropical Asia, described as a genus in 1840. Icones Plantarum Indiae Orientalis 2(1): 4-5 in English Icones Plantarum Indiae Orientalis 2(1): plates 359 and 360 line drawings as illustrationsTropicos, Isonandra Wight Isonandra is native to India, Sri Lanka, Malaysia, and Borneo. ;species ==References== Category:Flora of Asia Category:Sapotaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Isonandra
